title: Breaking Bread with Tom Papa Trailer
itunes:title: Breaking Bread with Tom Papa Trailer
description:
​I used to do the typical comedian podcast ​like everybody else but then I realized that all of the great conversations I've ever had involved family, friends, and food! Somehow sharing a table together opens up memories of times unlike anything else. So now, I'm launching Breaking Bread with Tom Papa. A mix of all the things I love great guests, comedy, food, and wine. Join us for episodes every Tuesday!

Make sure to subscribe to Breaking Bread on Apple Podcast, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts! I can't wait to see you there.

Subscribe on Apple Podcast!

https://bit.ly/BreakingBreadApplePodcast

Subscribe on Spotify!

https://bit.ly/BreakingBreadSpotify
